The reporting of results in the Community Edition, including the photo of a scanned item, helps us improve our product and the customer experience. Results and images of the MRZ, Barcode, and Document modules are NOT reported in any case.
Reset Data Reset all scan data? This will clear all of the data you have generated whilst using the app.

Your Scrabble tiles: Suggested words Note: we cannot guarantee the suggested words to be valid Scrabble words.\nOnly english words are considered.\nTherefore special characters like German Umlaute are simply ignored.\nBlank fields are not taken into account.\nThe calculated points are related to the English-Scrabble version as well. You want to try out all scan modes but you donâ€™t have a digital meter at home or any scrabble letters in your pocket? No problem! You can download a bundle of sample images directly to your phone or get it via email! Note that it may be difficult to scan and display the samples simultaneously from the same device ;) enter your email Preview available on Google Books See more details on Google Books Delete History The history is empty.
Reporting What is Anyline? Anyline is the leading text recognition SDK for your mobile device.\nYou can embed Anyline in your own mobile application and digitize and scan all kinds of texts, codes and numbers.\n\nThis app shows a few things that already work and gives ideas about what you can adjust!
Email Send me demo material

Congratulations! You did your first scan! Hurray! You scanned 10 times already! Whoop whoop! 30 scans? Look at you! Half of 100 scans? You\'re on a roll! 20 more scans and we are done! We ran out of trophies, good job! Choose the background color of the meter (black or white), by choosing the buttons on the left or the right side.\nThis mode recognizes meters with 6 or 7 pre-decimal digits. Choose the background color of the meter (black or white), by choosing the buttons on the left or the right side. Choose the correct number of pre-decimal digits you want to scan by clicking on the "minus" or "plus" symbol. That is basically all you need to know - now give it a try! Hint: You can use the MRZ scanner in portrait or landscape mode. Scan dial meters with this mode. Please only put relevant dials in the cutout in order to get the correct result. Scan serial numbers with this mode. Please only put relevant numbers in the cutout in order to get the correct result. selected mode type The barcode reader is currently supporting:\nUPC A, UPC E, EAN-8, EAN-13, EAN-14, EAN-18, EAN-99, EAN-128, Identcode, Leitcode, ISBN-13, ISBN-10, ISSN, ISMN, ITF-14, Data matrix, Aztec (limited), Codabar, QR code Result Barcode MRZ IBAN RedBull ISBN Document Bottlecap Records Scrabble Voucher Electric Meter Water Meter Gas Meter Digital Meter Dial Meter Serial Number Analog/Digital Meter Heat Meter License Plate OCR

Anyline OCR is able to scan barcodes simultaneously. This feature will only work if the newest Google Play services are installed. Update Google Play Services ON OFF Barcode Detection The required barcode API is not available.\nSimultaneous barcode scanning will not work.
Scan all sorts of analog energy meters with this mode. It doesnâ€™t matter how many digits or if there is a black or white background. Scan analog or digital meters with this mode. It doesnâ€™t matter how many digits, or if the analog meter has a black or white background.

Privacy Policy This App uses Google Analytics. \n\nGoogle Analytics grabs anonymised data about how the application is used.
\n\nWhy we are using Google Analytics: \n– To record how the app is being used \n– To find any potential problems facing users \n– To work out the global reach of our application \n– And ultimately, to improve the application for the users.
\n\nNone of this data can be linked to any individuals.
\n\nThe analytics is an essential part of this application. By using the application, you are consenting to the use of your anonymised data by Google Analytics.

Share images through Searching for document\nTap again to scan whole image Color Mode B&W mode Automatic Mode Manual Mode Share link through Basic Settings Automatic Tagging Define automatic tags to be applied on marked scans using the special page template Match preview aspect ratio Most devices have the highest resolution picture aspect ratio different from the preview one, this setting will select the highest picture resolution that matches with the aspect ratio of preview Rotate Image 180Âº Some devices have the camera upside down, this setting adjusts everything to make sense Usage Statistics Send various usage statistics to developer. No content data will be sent Send Message Send message to developer Usage Stats Do you want to enable ConText Scanner to send anonymous usage statistics to the developer?\n\nYou can change this anytime on the settings screen.
